definitions.description: This is a periodic visit schedule configuration table maintained by BackOffice manager. This will tell how frequently the store/outlet needs to be visited by sales rep.

constantValues: This is a periodic visit schedule configuration table maintained by BackOffice manager. This will tell how frequently the store/outlet needs to be visited by sales rep.

members.name: visitFrequencyId
members.description: Unique identifier for entity instances

members.name: createdOn
members.description: Date and time when the record was created.

constantValues: Date and time when the record was created.

members.name: modifiedOn
members.description: Date and time when the record was modified.

constantValues: Date and time when the record was modified.

members.name: statecode
members.description: Status of the Visit Frequency

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

supportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'statecode_display' is added to the 'VisitFrequency' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'statecode'
supportingAttribute.name: statecode_display

members.name: statuscode
members.description: Reason for the status of the Visit Frequency

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupCorrelatedValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder, correlatedValue}

supportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'statuscode_display' is added to the 'VisitFrequency' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'statuscode'
supportingAttribute.name: statuscode_display

constantValues: Reason for the status of the Visit Frequency

members.name: importSequenceNumber
members.description: Sequence number of the import that created this record.

constantValues: Sequence number of the import that created this record.

members.name: overriddenCreatedOn
members.description: Date and time that the record was migrated.

constantValues: Date and time that the record was migrated.

members.name: timeZoneRuleVersionNumber
members.description: For internal use only.

members.name: UTCConversionTimeZoneCode
members.description: Time zone code that was in use when the record was created.

constantValues: Time zone code that was in use when the record was created.

members.name: name
members.description: Subject / title of visit frequency

members.name: assignedRole
members.description:
This describes the role assigned to the visit.
E.g., Sales rep, Auditor etc.

constantValues:
This describes the role assigned to the visit.
E.g., Sales rep, Auditor etc.

members.name: dailyRecurrence
members.description: This indicates if the outlet is visited daily.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

supportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'dailyRecurrence_display' is added to the 'VisitFrequency' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'dailyRecurrence'
supportingAttribute.name: dailyRecurrence_display

constantValues: This indicates if the outlet is visited daily.

members.name: duration
members.description: This is the expected approximate duration of the visit.

constantValues: This is the expected approximate duration of the visit.

members.name: endDate
members.description: End date of the periodic visit schedule.

constantValues: End date of the periodic visit schedule.

members.name: everyspecifieddays
members.description: For daily recurrence this describes every specified day(s) the outlet to be visited.

constantValues: For daily recurrence this describes every specified day(s) the outlet to be visited.

members.name: everyspecifiedmonths
members.description: For monthly recurrence, this describes every specified month(s) the outlet to be visited.

constantValues: For monthly recurrence, this describes every specified month(s) the outlet to be visited.

members.name: everyspecifiedweeks
members.description: For weekly recurrence, this describes every specified week(s) the outlet to be visited.

constantValues: For weekly recurrence, this describes every specified week(s) the outlet to be visited.

members.name: monthlyRecurrence
members.description: This indicates if the outlet is visited monthly.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

supportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'monthlyRecurrence_display' is added to the 'VisitFrequency' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'monthlyRecurrence'
supportingAttribute.name: monthlyRecurrence_display

constantValues: This indicates if the outlet is visited monthly.

members.name: preferredTime
members.description:
This describes the preferred time of the visit.
E.g., Morning, Evening, etc.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

supportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'preferredTime_display' is added to the 'VisitFrequency' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'preferredTime'
supportingAttribute.name: preferredTime_display

constantValues:
This describes the preferred time of the visit.
E.g., Morning, Evening, etc.

members.name: recurOn
members.description: For monthly recurrence, this describes the specified week of the month.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

supportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'recurOn_display' is added to the 'VisitFrequency' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'recurOn'
supportingAttribute.name: recurOn_display

constantValues: For monthly recurrence, this describes the specified week of the month.

members.name: recurrence
members.description:
This describes the visit recurrence.
E.g., Daily, Weekly, etc.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

supportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'recurrence_display' is added to the 'VisitFrequency' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'recurrence'
supportingAttribute.name: recurrence_display

constantValues:
This describes the visit recurrence.
E.g., Daily, Weekly, etc.

members.name: startDate
members.description: Start date of the periodic visit schedule.

constantValues: Start date of the periodic visit schedule.

members.name: thedayofmonth
members.description: For monthly visit, this describes the specific day of the month from 1st to 31st.

constantValues: For monthly visit, this describes the specific day of the month from 1st to 31st.

members.name: thedayofweek
members.description:
For monthly visit, this describes the specific day of the week.
E.g., Day, Weekday, Weekend, Monday, etc.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

supportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'thedayofweek_display' is added to the 'VisitFrequency' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'thedayofweek'
supportingAttribute.name: thedayofweek_display

constantValues:
For monthly visit, this describes the specific day of the week.
E.g., Day, Weekday, Weekend, Monday, etc.

members.name: visitType
members.description:
This describes the type of visit.
This can be anything maintained by the customer.
E.g., Promotional visit, Quick visit, etc.

constantValues:
This describes the type of visit.
This can be anything maintained by the customer.
E.g., Promotional visit, Quick visit, etc.
